oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Lost Highway: 1st National Tour (1999)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Williams, Hank, 1923-1953;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: One color window card (black on white) announcing Lost Highway: The Music and Legend of Hank Williams starring Jason Petty on its first national tour from October 1999 to February 2000. Poster features a woodcut of Hank Williams.
